clinical_study.brief_title: Hearing Aid Education and Adaptation System
clinical_study.official_title: Interactive Technology for Hearing Aid Education and Acceptance

brief_summary.textblock: This RCT will have two arms: A control group that receives the standard of care from audiologists and an experimental group that receives both the standard of care and the at-home use of the TELLYHealth intervention. Subjects in each group will complete questionnaires at enrollment, mid-study and at the end of the study.

detailed_description.textblock: HTM will develop the "TELLYHealth (tm) system" that will provide education on hearing aid use and maintenance. HTM will conduct a randomized controlled trial (RCT) to quantify the benefits of TELLYHealth to patients and audiologists including: reductions in hearing handicap, improved knowledge of hearing aid handling, use and communications strategies; and improved audiologist aftercare. The investigators will recruit 80 subjects (half in each group) and each subject will participate in the study for 12 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Hearing Handicap Inventory for the Elderly (HHIE)
primary_outcome.description: Pre-post changes in the HHIE total scores
Pre-post changes in the CSOA communication strategies & attitudes scores
Pre-post changes in the HASK knowledge and skills scores

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive the standard of care in hearing aid education and the TELLYHealth intervention for use over a 12-week period.
Subjects will receive the standard of care in hearing aid education and will be followed for 123 weeks.

intervention.description: Educational videos and vehicle for Q&As on hearing aid use and issues.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Speaks and reads English fluently
- Has mild (26-40 dB) to moderate (41-55 dB) binaural sensorineural hearing loss
- Will be fitted with two hearing aids for the first time at the time of enrollment
- Owns a standard TV, and either a tablet computer with Internet access or a smartphone
- Has sufficient corrected vision to watch videos and read text on the TV and mobile device
- No signs of dementia
Exclusion Criteria:
- Prior use of hearing amplification

patient_data.ipd_description: Aggregated data on hearing aid education will be shared.
